menu_options.add_notification_sample: Create a new notification (with pattern sample)

add_notification.description:
Set up the notification below.
•Color Picker can set a solid color or look up #RRGGBB values for pattern use.
•Create a pattern by using the +Add button.
•Auto-Clear with a 0s timeout clears immediately after pattern finishes.
•Any other timeout is measured from notification start.
•Larger numbers are higher priority.
